    Sedimentary facies classification

    less than 1 minute read

    The following sequence of images show results from a workflow to processes seismic cross-sections.

    Seismic cross-section showing amplitude (frequency band modulated)

    Seismic cross-section showing the coherence attribute (discontinuity) from original data. Seismic cross-section showing the coherence attribute (discontinuity) smoothed with kuwahara filter.

    Seismic cross-section showing the maximum magnitud (Fourier). Seismic cross-section showing the maximum magnitud (Fourier) smoothed with kuwahara filter.

    Seismic cross-section showing the frequency content. Seismic cross-section showing the frequency content smoothed with kuwahara filter.

    Seismic cross-section showing the curvature attribute. Seismic cross-section showing the curvature attribute kuwahara filter.

    Seismic cross-section showing the facies classification using self-organising maps. Seismic cross-section showing the facies classification using self-organising maps from smoothed data.

    Tags: attributes, geo, post, seismic
